code:
classDiagram
    vtkMRMLSegmentEditorNode *-- SegmentationEditor: Creates
    vtkMRMLSegmentEditorLogic *-- SegmentationEditor: Creates
    SegmentModifier "0..1" *-- SegmentationEditor: Creates
    SegmentationEditor --* "1..*" SegmentationEffect: Creates
    SegmentationEffect --o "1" SegmentModifier: Uses
    SegmentationEffect --* "0..*" SegmentationEffectPipeline: Creates
    SegmentationEffect --o vtkMRMLScriptedModuleNode: Creates
    SegmentationEffectPipeline --|> vtkMRMLLayerDMScriptedPipeline: Inherits
    SegmentationEffectPipeline --o vtkMRMLScriptedModuleNode: Uses
    vtkMRMLLayerDMScriptedPipeline "0..*" o-- vtkMRMLLayerDisplayableManager
    vtkMRMLLayerDisplayableManager "1" *-- AbstractView: Registers
    AbstractView <|-- SliceView: Inherits
    AbstractView <|-- ThreeDView: Inherits
    SegmentModifier --o "1" Segmentation
    Segmentation --o "1" vtkMRMLVolumeNode
    Segmentation --o "1" vtkMRMLSegmentationNode

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 主架构 的分支。
